attributes.action: check why the bank can take money from someone account and not put it into a shop account for five days or more when questioned they say the money is in the banking system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please could you ask the bank why a customer can pay for goods bought the cash comes from their account right away , but the shop has to wait for 5 days before they can have it in their account also charges of £39 but they have the money in the system.

rejection.details: We suggest you ask the bank yourself.  Or you could reword your petition to request a measureable action of the government, for example, that the government changes the law to force banks to speed up their processing of payments.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
